long_description: numark ltd is a chain of independent pharmacies in the uk. with 3000 outlets throughout england, wales, scotland and northern ireland, they are the largest such chain in the uk. each pharmacy business within numark is an independently owned outlet, but membership of numark allows individual retailers to take advantage of group purchasing deals to reduce their costs. this model is known as a symbol group, or virtual chain. numark also offers marketing support, such as signage, advertising and demographic research for product targeting purposes, to its members.

generated_description: numark, legally known as numark ltd., is a pharmaceutical wholesale company based in runcorn, england. the company offers a wide range of services and products to support independent pharmacies, including a large own-brand offering, discounted prices, and access to a variety of suppliers. numark provides end-to-end support for setting up profitable pharmacies, operational efficiencies, and training resources. the company is a division of phoenix healthcare distribution limited.
